welcome.1: Alone we go faster, together we go further!

onBoard.title: A space for learning and sharing
onBoard.desc: Designed to help you develop your skills, nurture your ideas, and grow alongside a passionate community.

box1.title: Learn new skills
box1.desc: Access a wide range of courses and tutorials to enhance your knowledge.

box2.title: Share your knowledge
box2.desc: Create and share your own content with the community.

box3.title: Interact with other students
box3.desc: Discuss together, share thought & learn together

signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.para: We are happy to have you back, you really missed us!

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.para: Sign up to discover a world of learning and sharing.
